>
[Adaptive Vision](/Feats.aspx?ID=3280) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 200 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

After years of using black powder weaponry in dimly lit spaces, you've become accustomed to dazzling flashes of light and sudden shifts in illumination. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a visual effect, you get a critical success instead.
